name: Oliver Jones
story: Ryan Thompson is the youngest son of a military family, and has always felt a sense of duty to serve his country. He enlisted as soon as he turned 18, and has steadily risen through the ranks due to his skill and dedication. He is married to his high school sweetheart and they have one child together. Despite the danger of his job, Ryan is a calm and steady presence in his unit, always willing to help his fellow soldiers.
